entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:36 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:36 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:36 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
